name: 2017 2nd International Conference on Communication and Information Systems (ICCIS 2017)--SCOPUS, EI
content: 2017 2nd International Conference on Communication and Information Systems (ICCIS 2017)--SCOPUS, EI Compendex Wuhan, China November 7-9, 2017 http://www.iccis.org/ Publication: Peer reviewed and presented papers will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM, (ISBN: 978-1-4503-4809-6), which will be archived in the ACM Digital Library, and submitted for Ei Compendex and Scopus index. History: ICCIS 2016 was successfully held in Bangkok, Thailand. Papers in ICCIS 2016 conference proceedings has been indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus! Submission Methods: Full Paper(publication and oral presentation) Abstract(oral presentation only) Electronic Submission System (.pdf) http://www.easychair.org/conferences/?conf=iccis2017 Contacts: Ms. Hedy Y. Huang E-mail: iccisconf@zhconf.ac.cn Tel: +86-28-86256789
